EngLawName: National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts  Policy on Charges for Use of Image Files and Data
LawName: 國立臺灣美術館藏品圖像使用收費標準

EngLawAttachements.FileName: Appendix  National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts Charges for Use of Image Files and Data.PDF
Appendix  National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts Charges for Use of Image Files and Data.doc

EngLawHistories:
1.The Decree of Wen-Jian-Tzu No. 0971108342 enacted, promulgated and executed by The Council of Cultural Affairs, Executive Yuan dated April 29,2008
2.Abolished on Novenber 07, 2012

EngLawArticles.EngArticleContent: This policy is issued pursuant to Section 1 of Chapter 10 of the Charges Act.

A fee will be charged for use of image files and data of the National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts.  Please see Appendix: Charges for Use of Image Files and Data for fee rates and fee calculation methods.
Use of image files and data of the National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts is regulated by the National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts Use Policy.
This policy will be effective from the date of issue.
